tool_description: The IG Public Info API provides valuable information about Instagram accounts and their posts. With this API, developers can easily access data such as follower count, media count, biography, username, profile picture URL, website, and more for any Instagram account. Additionally, developers can retrieve detailed information about specific posts including captions, media URLs, timestamps, like counts, comments counts, and media types.
name: IG Public Info
title: IG Public Info

api_list.name: Media
api_list.description: Retrieves detailed information about posts from an Instagram account including captions, media URLs, timestamps, like counts, comments counts, media types, and more.

api_list.name: Basic info
api_list.description: Retrieves general information about an Instagram account including follower count, media count, biography, username, profile picture URL, website, and more.
